title: The editors of The Lancet Microbe on the origins of Covid-19. “SARS-CoV-2...
content: The editors of The Lancet Microbe on the origins of Covid-19. “SARS-CoV-2 is a natural virus that found its way into humans through mundane contact with infected wildlife that went on to cause the most consequential pandemic for over a century.”
author: Jason Kottke
